name: SPEEEED limit
description:
hi, and thanks for reading and playing!

within a birthday party for my 3y old son and a family reunion i managed to finish the game... i still don't believe it ;-). special thanks to my wife, i love u.

goal of the game

get as many points as possible in 30 seconds.

mind the speed limit.

controls

click upper area OR press 'b': break

click lower area OR press 'c': change terrain

game info

the speed limits are: none - 50 - none - 130 - none - 90 -none

asphalt: max speed = 180

gravel: max speed = 120

mud: max speed = 60

points calculation

increase your points by covering distance

decrease your points by speeding

while debugging i got these scores

- using just the key 'c': 664 points

- using both keys 'c' and 'b': 770 points

maybe you want to share yours...

my stack

artwork -> ipad + procreate

sounds -> ipad + garageband

coding -> vsc + phaser

best regards monoDinoDev MAKE GAMES NOT WAR!
